name: normf

stmt.origin: fmpti(hs0, cno, chba, cr, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0))))

body.origin:
|- wf(cno, chba, cr)
-| wceq(cno, cmpt(hs0, chba, cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0)))))
-| wi(wcel(cv(hs0), chba), wcel(cfv(csqrt, co(cv(hs0), csp, cv(hs0))), cr))
-| diffsc(hs0, chba)
-| diffsc(hs0, cr)
body.pretty:
⊢ (normh : ~H → ℝ)
⊣ normh =(hs0 ∈ ~H ↦(sqrt `(hs0[.ih]hs0)))
⊣ (hs0 ∈ ~H →(sqrt `(hs0[.ih]hs0))∈ ℝ)
⊣ d(hs0, ~H)
⊣ d(hs0, ℝ)
